00001 #ifndef _UPK_PROTOCOL_H
00002 #define _UPK_PROTOCOL_H

00023 #include "upk_error.h"
00024 #include "upk_types.h"
00025 
00026 /* ********************************************************************************************************************
00027    enums must preserve order. To add support for a new protocol version, create a new vN interface, add whatever
00028    additional fields necessary to a vN_protocol_structs.h and append the macro in the appropriate location here.  and
00029    add the version specific items to the switch in upk_protocol.c. Note that the underlying protocol does _not_ need to
00030    maintain anything as a subset; just the wrapper function must support old and new styles.  this allows for controlled 
00031    deprecation, while still providing protocol and API compatibility.
00032    ******************************************************************************************************************* */
00033 
00034 #define UPK_MAX_PACKET_SIZE 65536                          
00035 #define UPK_PACKET_HEADER_LEN 16
00036 #define UPK_PACKET_FOOTER_LEN 4
00037 
00038 #define UPK_MIN_SUPPORTED_PROTO 0
00039 #define UPK_MAX_SUPPORTED_PROTO 0
00040 
00041 #define UPK_DATA __upk_data
00042 #define UPK_DATA_PTR __upk_data_ptr
00043 #define UPK_DATA_LEN __upk_data_len
00044 #define UPK_BUF __upk_buf
00045 #define UPK_BUF_PTR __upk_buf_ptr
00046 #define UPK_UINT8_BUFFER __upk_uint8_buf
00047 #define UPK_UINT16_BUFFER __upk_uint16_buf
00048 #define UPK_UINT32_BUFFER __upk_uint32_buf
00049 #define UPK_STRING_LENGTH __upk_string_len
00050 
00051 /* XXX you will want to redefine these depending on the type of data you're dealing with */
00052 #define UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER_TYPEDEF upk_pkttype_t
00053 #define UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER pkttype
00054 
00055 #define UPK_INIT_DESERIALIZE(TYPE) \
00056     TYPE * UPK_DATA = NULL; \
00057     unsigned char * UPK_BUF_PTR = UPK_BUF; \
00058     uint32_t UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = 0; \
00059     uint16_t UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = 0; \
00060     uint8_t UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = 0; \
00061     UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = UPK_UINT32_BUFFER + 0; \
00062     UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = UPK_UINT16_BUFFER + 0; \
00063     UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = UPK_UINT8_BUFFER + 0
00064 
00065 
00066 #define UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB) MEMB ## _len
00067 
00068 #define UPK_INIT_DESERIALIZE_MSG(TYPE) \
00069     UPK_INIT_DESERIALIZE(TYPE); \
00070     UPK_DATA = calloc(1,sizeof(*UPK_DATA)); \
00071     UPK_FETCH_ENUM(UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER_TYPEDEF, UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER)
00072 
00073 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT32_T(TYPE,MEMB) \
00074     memcpy(&UPK_UINT32_BUFFER, UPK_BUF_PTR, sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)); \
00075     UPK_DATA->MEMB = (TYPE) ntohl( UPK_UINT32_BUFFER ); \
00076     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)
00077 
00078 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT32(MEMB) \
00079     UPK_FETCH_UINT32_T(uint32_t, MEMB)
00080 
00081 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT16_T(TYPE,MEMB) \
00082     memcpy(&UPK_UINT16_BUFFER, UPK_BUF_PTR, sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)); \
00083     UPK_DATA->MEMB = (TYPE) ntohs( UPK_UINT16_BUFFER ); \
00084     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)
00085 
00086 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT16(MEMB) \
00087     UPK_FETCH_UINT16_T(uint16_t, MEMB)
00088 
00089 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT8_T(TYPE,MEMB) \
00090     memcpy(&UPK_UINT8_BUFFER, UPK_BUF_PTR, sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)); \
00091     UPK_DATA->MEMB = (TYPE) UPK_UINT8_BUFFER; \
00092     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)
00093 
00094 #define UPK_FETCH_UINT8(MEMB) \
00095     UPK_FETCH_UINT8_T(uint8_t, MEMB)
00096 
00097 #define UPK_FETCH_BOOL(MEMB) \
00098     UPK_FETCH_UINT8_T(bool, MEMB)
00099 
00100 #define UPK_FETCH_ENUM(TYPE,MEMB) \
00101     UPK_FETCH_UINT32_T(TYPE, MEMB)
00102 
00103 #define UPK_FETCH_STRING(MEMB) \
00104     /* memset(UPK_DATA->MEMB,0,sizeof(UPK_DATA->MEMB)); */ \
00105     /* UPK_DATA->MEMB = calloc(1, UPK_DATA->UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB) + 1);  * null terminate */ \
00106     memcpy(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB)); \
00107     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_DATA->UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB)
00108 
00109 #define UPK_FETCH_DATA_TO_BUF(BUF, LEN) \
00110     BUF = calloc(1, UPK_DATA->LEN); \
00111     memcpy(BUF, UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->LEN); \
00112     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_DATA->LEN
00113 
00114 #define UPK_FETCH_DATA(MEMB) \
00115     UPK_FETCH_DATA_TO_BUF(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB))
00116 
00117 #define UPK_FETCH_ARRAY(MEMB, LEN) \
00118     memcpy(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_BUF_PTR, LEN); \
00119     UPK_BUF_PTR += LEN
00120 
00121 #define UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE(TYPE) \
00122     TYPE * UPK_DATA = (TYPE *) UPK_DATA_PTR; \
00123     upk_pkt_buf_t * UPK_BUF = NULL; \
00124     upk_pkt_buf_t * UPK_BUF_PTR = NULL; \
00125     uint32_t UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = 0; \
00126     uint16_t UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = 0; \
00127     uint8_t UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = 0; \
00128     size_t UPK_STRING_LENGTH = 0; \
00129     UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = UPK_UINT32_BUFFER + 0; \
00130     UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = UPK_UINT16_BUFFER + 0; \
00131     UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = UPK_UINT8_BUFFER + 0; \
00132     UPK_STRING_LENGTH = UPK_STRING_LENGTH + 0
00133 
00134 #define UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE_BUF(TYPE, LEN) \
00135     UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE(TYPE); \
00136     UPK_BUF = calloc(1, LEN); \
00137     UPK_BUF_PTR = UPK_BUF
00138 
00139 #define UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE_MSG(TYPE) \
00140     UPK_INIT_SERIALIZE_BUF(TYPE, UPK_DATA_LEN); \
00141     UPK_PUT_ENUM(UPK_MSG_IDENTIFIER)
00142 
00143 #define UPK_PUT_UINT32(MEMB) \
00144     UPK_UINT32_BUFFER = htonl( (uint32_t) UPK_DATA->MEMB ); \
00145     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, &UPK_UINT32_BUFFER, sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)); \
00146     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT32_BUFFER)
00147 
00148 #define UPK_PUT_UINT16(MEMB) \
00149     UPK_UINT16_BUFFER = htons( (uint16_t) UPK_DATA->MEMB ); \
00150     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, &UPK_UINT16_BUFFER, sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)); \
00151     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT16_BUFFER)
00152 
00153 #define UPK_PUT_UINT8(MEMB) \
00154     UPK_UINT8_BUFFER = (uint8_t) UPK_DATA->MEMB; \
00155     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, &UPK_UINT8_BUFFER, sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)); \
00156     UPK_BUF_PTR += sizeof(UPK_UINT8_BUFFER)
00157 
00158 #define UPK_PUT_BOOL(MEMB) \
00159     UPK_PUT_UINT8(MEMB)
00160 
00161 #define UPK_PUT_ENUM(MEMB) \
00162     UPK_PUT_UINT32(MEMB)
00163 
00164 #define UPK_PUT_STRING(MEMB) \
00165     UPK_STRING_LENGTH = strnlen(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_MAX_STRING_LEN); \
00166     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->MEMB, strnlen(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_STRING_LENGTH)); \
00167     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_STRING_LENGTH
00168 
00169 #define UPK_PUT_DATA_FROM_BUF(BUF, LEN) \
00170     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, BUF, UPK_DATA->LEN); \
00171     UPK_BUF_PTR += UPK_DATA->LEN
00172 
00173 #define UPK_PUT_DATA(MEMB) \
00174     UPK_PUT_DATA_FROM_BUF(UPK_DATA->MEMB, UPK_MEMB_TO_LEN(MEMB))
00175 
00176 #define UPK_PUT_ARRAY(MEMB, LEN) \
00177     memcpy(UPK_BUF_PTR, UPK_DATA->MEMB, LEN); \
00178     UPK_BUF_PTR += LEN
00179 
00180 #ifdef __NEVERDEFINED_NEED_FOR_AUTOSCAN_TO_SEE_FUNCS_USED_IN_ABOVE_MACROS
00181 static inline void
00182 __never_compiled(void)
00183 {
00184     void                   *foo, *bar;
00185     int32_t                 baz = 1;
00186 
00187     foo = calloc(1, sizeof(int32_t));
00188     bar = calloc(1, sizeof(int32_t));
00189     memcpy(foo, bar, sizeof(int32_t));
00190     baz = strnlen("foobar", 64);
00191     baz = htonl(baz);
00192     baz = ntohl(baz);
00193     baz = (int32_t) htons((int16_t) baz);
00194     baz = (int32_t) ntohs((int16_t) baz);
00195 }
00196 #endif

00267 
00268 #define UPK_N_SUPPORTED_PROTOS (1 + UPK_MAX_SUPPORTED_PROTO - UPK_MIN_SUPPORTED_PROTO)
00269 #define _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(A) (UPK_##A##_LIMIT - UPK_##A##_ORIGIN - UPK_N_SUPPORTED_PROTOS)
00270 #define UPK_N_REQ_TYPES _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(REQ)
00271 #define UPK_N_REPL_TYPES _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(REPL)
00272 #define UPK_N_PUB_TYPES _UPK_N_PER_TYPE(PUB)
00273 
00274 #define _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(V,A,B) (V < UPK_##A##_LIMIT) ? (V - UPK_##A##_ORIGIN) + B 
00275 #define UPK_MSGTYPE_IDX(MSGTYPE) \
00276     ( _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(MSGTYPE,REQ,0) : _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(MSGTYPE,REPL,UPK_N_REQ_TYPES) : \
00277     _UPK_MSGTYPE_OFFSET(MSGTYPE,PUB,UPK_N_REQ_TYPES+UPK_N_REPL_TYPES) : -1 )
